attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having looked through the Petitions Site I notice a significant number of REJECTED Petitions calling for the Resignation of Gordon Brown.  Reasons for not allowing Petition given as Similar or Overlaps with another Petition!
I call on Gordon Brown to allow this Petition to show his ability to REALLY LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE!
No More Spin No More Lies lets put our Cards on the table and Call a General Election NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
